title: Header navigation tubelight effect responsiveness
description: Verify the header navigation displays the tubelight effect correctly and adjusts dynamically on various screen sizes including desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Open the landing page on a desktop browser
Check that the tubelight effect is visible on the navigation bar
Resize the browser window to mobile dimensions
Verify the tubelight effect remains visible and consistent on the responsive navigation menu

title: Navigation hover dropdowns functionality
description: Ensure hovering over navigation items triggers dropdown menus and links are accessible.

steps.description: Hover over each navigation menu item with dropdown capability
Check that the dropdown menu appears promptly and contains the correct options
Click on dropdown menu options
Verify navigation to the appropriate linked pages or sections

title: Responsive mobile menu toggle
description: Validate the responsive menu toggles correctly on mobile devices and all menu options are accessible.

steps.description: Access the landing page on a mobile device or emulated viewport
Tap the mobile menu hamburger icon
Check that the menu expands showing all navigation options
Tap the menu icon again or outside the menu area
Verify the menu collapses and is hidden

title: Hero section animations functionality
description: Check that the hero section animations including the animated headline and glass & stardust effect buttons display and perform smoothly.

steps.description: Load the landing page and observe the hero section
Verify the headline animates upon page load
Ensure the glass effect button displays with correct visual styling
Ensure the stardust effect button displays and animates correctly

title: Hero section CTA button functionality
description: Validate that call-to-action buttons in the hero section trigger the correct actions or navigation.

steps.description: Click the glass effect CTA button
Confirm navigation or action is triggered as per specification
Click the stardust effect CTA button
Confirm navigation or action is triggered correctly

title: Features section animated cards display
description: Verify that product features are presented with animated cards and AI capability icons with smooth animations.

steps.description: Scroll to the features section
Check each feature card animates on screen entry
Verify all AI capability icons are visible and animate correctly

title: Real-time lead capture stream visualization accuracy
description: Ensure the real-time lead capture stream reflects simulated or live data accurately and animations run smoothly.

steps.description: Observe the lead capture stream section after page load
Confirm stream animation flows without stutter or freeze
Validate data points in the visualization correspond to simulated lead capture data

title: AI email draft animation interaction
description: Confirm that the interactive AI email drafting animation with typing effects operates accurately and mimics real-time drafting.

steps.description: Scroll to or navigate to the email drafting animation component
Verify the typing effects mimic AI drafting behavior smoothly
Ensure no typographic glitches or animation stalls occur

title: Profile research AI demonstration correctness
description: Verify the profile research and enrichment demo displays accurate and clear AI-driven profile enrichment steps or results.

steps.description: Navigate to the profile research section
Confirm demonstration visually shows enrichment steps
Ensure no UI glitches during animations or data display

title: Dashboard preview scroll animation performance
description: Validate the dashboard preview panel scroll animations are smooth and elements appear correctly during scroll interaction.

steps.description: Scroll through the dashboard preview section
Verify smooth container scroll animations with no lag or jank
Check dashboard components render correctly on scroll

title: Workflow section visual step demonstration accuracy
description: Check the workflow section correctly shows lead generation steps with clear visuals and step transitions.

steps.description: View the workflow section
Confirm all lead generation steps are visually represented in order
Verify smooth visual transition animations between steps

title: AI agents capabilities showcase accuracy
description: Verify the multiple AI agent capabilities are presented with accurate descriptions and animations.

steps.description: Scroll to AI agents capability section
Check that all featured AI agents are displayed with correct icons and descriptions
Ensure animations for each agent run smoothly

title: Use case scenarios correctness and clarity
description: Ensure all use case scenarios are displayed clearly and accurately describing the product application.

steps.description: Navigate to the use cases section
Verify all use cases presented are relevant and accurate
Check UI clarity and absence of layout issues

title: Pricing plans comparison and CTA functionality
description: Validate pricing plans display accurate information and CTAs initiate expected actions.

steps.description: Scroll to the pricing section
Verify pricing plans and feature comparison are visually clear and accurate
Click on each pricing plan's CTA button
Confirm that expected navigation or lead capture actions are triggered

title: Customer testimonials section display and content accuracy
description: Check that customer testimonials are displayed correctly with readable content and no UI overlaps.

steps.description: View the testimonials section
Verify all testimonials display their respective content and customer names
Check no text clipping or UI glitches occur

title: FAQ accordion expansion and collapse behavior
description: Ensure FAQ items expand and collapse smoothly without UI glitches and that only one or multiple accordions behave as intended.

steps.description: Click on an FAQ question to expand answer
Verify the answer content expands smoothly below the question
Click the expanded FAQ question again
Ensure the answer section collapses without UI artifacts

title: Contact form input validation and submission
description: Validate the contact form properly enforces required fields, email format validation, and successfully submits inquiries.

steps.description: Attempt to submit the contact form with empty fields
Verify error messages prompt completion of required fields
Input invalid email format and attempt submit
Check appropriate email format error message appears
Fill all fields with valid data and submit the form
Confirm the form submits successfully and a confirmation message is shown

title: Meeting booking integration functionality
description: Ensure the meeting scheduler accepts bookings, validates user input, and confirms appointments appropriately.

steps.description: Open the meeting booking feature section
Attempt to submit booking with missing required fields
Verify validation prompts the user to complete all required information
Submit valid booking details
Confirm booking is processed and user receives confirmation feedback

title: Final CTA button with energy beam effect engagement
description: Check that the final call-to-action button with energy beam visual effect triggers expected actions and animations perform smoothly.

steps.description: Scroll to the final CTA section
Verify the energy beam visual effect animates correctly
Click the final CTA button
Confirm that the expected navigation or interaction occurs

title: Cookie consent banner compliance and preferences storage
description: Validate the GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner appears on first visit, allows preferences selection, and persists user choices.

steps.description: Load the landing page on a fresh browser session without prior consent
Confirm the cookie consent banner is displayed
Select cookie preferences and accept
Verify preferences are saved and banner disappears
Reload the page
Check that cookie banner does not appear again and preferences persist

title: Scroll progress utility accuracy
description: Ensure the scroll progress indicator accurately reflects user's position on the page.

steps.description: Scroll through the landing page slowly
Verify the scroll progress bar updates continuously and proportionally to scroll position

title: Scroll-to-top button visibility and functionality
description: Check the scroll-to-top button appears after scrolling down and scrolls the user back to the top smoothly on click.

steps.description: Scroll down the landing page sufficiently
Verify the scroll-to-top button becomes visible
Click the scroll-to-top button
Confirm the page scrolls smoothly back to the top

title: Accessibility feature skip to content functionality
description: Verify the skip to content link is accessible via keyboard navigation and directs focus to main content.

steps.description: Use keyboard tab navigation on page load
Confirm skip to content link is focused first
Activate the skip to content link using keyboard
Verify keyboard focus moves to the main content area of the page

title: UI performance under repeated user scrolling
description: Test that all animations and UI components maintain smooth performance and responsiveness during rapid and repeated scrolling.

steps.description: Perform rapid repeated scrolling up and down through the entire landing page
Verify all animated components maintain consistent frame rates and no crashes occur

title: Pricing plans feature comparison accuracy
description: Validate that the feature comparison table accurately reflects the features included in each pricing tier.

steps.description: Navigate to the pricing section
Cross-verify features listed for each plan against the product documentation
Ensure visual indicators such as checkmarks correspond correctly to available features
